refnamediv.refpurpose: a TV viewer for the Gnome environment

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: &app; is a program to watch TV on a computer, specifically on Linux, within the Gnome environment. You can take screenshots and record video and audio. &app; has a Teletext viewer built in and supports Closed Caption and Teletext subtitles. It is extensible through plugins. For more information open the Gnome help and choose Applications -> Sound and Video -> Zapping.
